title: Spot's First Christmas
description: It's Christmas Eve, and there's lots to do to get ready for the big day! First Spot helps his dad bring home the tree, then it's time to wrap the presents. Which one is for Spot? He'll have to wait and see. It's almost time for bed, but first Spot gets a special visit from a group of Christmas carolers. Come along and celebrate Spot's very first Christmas! "Spot is one of the essential experiences of childhood."-- Parents Magazine
author: Eric Hill
